scripts.publish-beta: aws s3 sync ./dist s3://wow-guild-site-beta --exclude "*.html" --delete --cache-control "max-age=31557600, public,immutable" && npm run publish-html-beta
scripts.publish-html-beta: aws s3 cp ./dist/ s3://wow-guild-site-beta --exclude "*" --include "*.html" --recursive --cache-control "no-cache, no-store, must-revalidate"
scripts.publish: aws s3 sync ./dist s3://wow-guild-site-production --exclude "*.html" --delete --cache-control "max-age=31557600, public,immutable" && npm run publish-html
scripts.publish-html: aws s3 cp ./dist/ s3://wow-guild-site-production --exclude "*" --include "*.html" --recursive --cache-control "max-age=3600, public, must-revalidate"
scripts.build-publish: npm run gulp && npm run publish
